title: River in India sacred to Hindus blanketed in toxic white foam
content:
1. River in India sacred to Hindus blanketed in toxic white foam  The Washington Post
  2. On Delhi’s Toxic River, Prayers to a Sun Struggling to Shine Through Smog  The New York Times
  3. Devotees take holy dip in Yamuna's toxic waters in India  Reuters
  4. Clouds of toxic foam float on surface of India's sacred Yamuna river  New York Post
  5. Hindu women bathe in toxic foam to pray in Delhi river  The Independent
